sentences.sentence: "A codfish," replied the voice, "only a codfish."
sentences.translation: “鳕鱼，”声音回答说，“只是一条鳕鱼。”

sentences.sentence: Have we been captained all this time by a codfish!
sentences.translation: 难道我们一直以来都把一条鳕鱼当做船长吗！

sentences.sentence: How about codfish with macaroni and cheese for dinner.
sentences.translation: 晚上吃鳕鱼加奶酪通心面怎么样？
